title: Need some Garamond History.
content:
I am currently take a typography course in my graphic design program and could really use some assistance.

Would anyone know of any credible online resources that have a history/general info on the Garamond typeface. I have taken a look at wikipedia and found a few books but would like more sources that have a bit more information.

Any help would really be appreciated  
Thanks

 [‹ Just when you thought it might be safe to say "Comic Sans"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080824/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38104 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typographic Experiment ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080824/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38067 "Go to next forum topic")
author: quirco1
